title: Unlimited Cycles of Death - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Horror   Mature   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Calm Protagonist   Card Games   Childhood Love   Clever Protagonist   Coma   Confident Protagonist   Criminals   Cruel Characters   Death   Doting Love Interests   Flashbacks   Game Elements   Gate to Another World   Lovers Reunited   Multiple POV   Murders   Mystery Solving   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Strong Love Interests   Survival Game   Unlimited Flow
author: Zǐ Jiè   紫界
description:
Six strangers met in a mysterious, enclosed space.

Amongst them, one of them claimed to be a “senior” and stated that there was a cold-blooded “ghost” among them who kills without batting an eye.

How can they escape the pursuit of the “ghost” and escape from this world, this is the greatest problem they are faced with.

Mu Qin: I have a person I really like.

He’s a great person. He always likes to hold a knife and dance in front of me.

But one day, he went crazy.>
